citances.sentence: It is unnecessary to delve into the reasons why the applicant in this proceeding was considered to be justified in refusing the proposal of the current fourth respondent. It is also unnecessary to examine the reasons for judgment of this Court which dealt with an appeal by Lendlease against a costs order made by O'Dwyer FM; see Primelife Corporation Limited v Bufalo [2008] FCA 1742 , per Jessup J.
